description.p: This document describes how to clean up the lib/ext directory, to remove any Jars that do not belong to NetBeans. You might have added your own jars to the lib/ext directory following the temporary instructions given in the GP course. Now that the GP code and libraries is packaged in NetBeans modules, you need to clean the lib/ext directory up again. After you have done this clean up, you can proceed by installing the GP layer and other libraries as Modules.

ul.li: clean up an existing installation of GP/NetBeans

description.p: The following description will focus on the second option.

section.title: Cleaning up an existing installation of NetBeans

description.p: First make sure you are not running NetBeans (otherwise the jars will be locked). Then remove all jars you have added to lib and lib/ext. lib/ext should contain roughly the following jars:
description.ul:
core-XXX.jar (where XXX is something like windows or ui)
openide.jar
updater.jar
ide.ks
description.p: Now you are ready for installing the GP and Logging modules.
